name: Black Diamond Soloist Gloves - Men's
description: Made for mountaineering, alpine climbing, and general winter use, the Soloists have a modular construction for quicker dry times and fine-tuning to a wide range of temperatures. PrimaLoft® insulation on the palms is needle punched to entangle the fibres. This reduces bulk while retaining warmth, and banishes that slip-slide feel when you’re gripping tools or poles.Outer shells are light, yet abrasion-resistant Pertex Shield nylon with 4-way stretch.Goat leather palms, plus palm patches with Kevlar® stitching, add abrasion protection and grip.Removable liners feature 100% waterproof BDry™ inserts.PrimaLoft Gold insulation keeps you warm with 170g weight on liner hand backs and 133g weight needle punch on the palms for maximum dexterity and minimal bulk.Target temperature range is -26 to -9°C.
